website_summaries.verdict: Another good but not great headphone from Samsung, the wireless Samsung Level On Pro has enough merits to make it worth considering, particularly if you're someone who owns one of Samsung's latest smartphones phones.
pros: The Samsung Level On Pro offers Bluetooth wireless streaming and active noise-cancellation in a fairly compact folding design that offers good sound quality for Bluetooth
The headphone supports Samsung's proprietary audio format available in its latest smartphones
A carrying pouch is included and the free Level companion app for Android devices allows you to tweak the sound
cons: Samsung's ultra high-quality audio has very little impact on sound quality and is only available on its devices
headphone doesn't do quite enough to distinguish itself from competing models

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Did a bunch of research on ANC headphones and this seemed like the best combo of bluetooth and noise cancelling for the price (by a reputable brand). I've been using them for about a month and I'm a fan - I like the buttonless 'touchpad' controls so you're not feeling around for little buttons. They're comfortable, and fold up (somewhat). No regrets so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is fine but the rest of the product is awful
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is fine but the rest of the product is awful. The leather covering the ear cushions came detached after about 6 months making them almost unusable. In addition the plastic on the side arms cracked in several places and eventually broke in half on one side. Then the other side cracked in half at around 9 months. So, they are a mess of tape and bare ear cushions only suitable for using at the house if I have no other options. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: They keep falling apart
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair and they just keeping coming apart. The lining is coming out and a piece of the plastic near one side of the headphone just broke off. I am very careful when it comes to my headphones and the noise cancellation, battery life and sound quality are great, but what good is it if they are just coming apart on its own. It's too bad because I really like the product, but I am going to have to go with something else in the near future. I wouldn't recommend these to anyone......
customer_reviews.author: iKross Stylish Pen

customer_reviews.title: You all should replace this product
customer_reviews.text: The construction of the headcushion and fabric are poorly designed and executed! Under normal use and conditions it has dislodged itself. Sad part is the company does not honor the warranty to replace the product. As seen in the pictures I have to resort to taping it together.
customer_reviews.author: GQ 007

customer_reviews.title: My first pair of quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the noise cancelling etc. I normally have the small in-ear headphones. decided to get a nice large pair for watching shows on my laptop and really like them.
customer_reviews.author: John Tye

customer_reviews.title: Get something stronger
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews, it's falling apart in less than 30 days..headband is broken..2 stars because overall great sound ,comfort and noise cancelling, but is very fragile..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he has given great feedback.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my husband. Overall he likes them, only wished they fit completely around his entire ear. They are average size and he wears glasses, so after awhile they hurt, because of the circumference. n the sound, he has given great feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this headset
customer_reviews.text: Used the headset 4 times before it broke. The left side ear piece broke off when putting on the headset. Samsung could not do anything as they said I damaged it. I guess the headsets are not make to be used under normal fashion. I would not recommend this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get them. If you are here you want them.
customer_reviews.text: These are a lifesaver. Got them for work to zone out some people and oh my! The noise canceling powers are unmatched! I had other headphones from companies I will not name for triple the price, but why? These are just as good and a fair price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These sound great. Active noise cancellation is good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I tried many others beats and Bose. These sound great. Active noise cancellation is good but not great. I am very happy with my choice. I would rate this equivalent to the high end Bose and beats headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've tried quite a lot of headphones in the past: Bose, Beats, Sony, JBL, etc. None of them can touch the headphones. They are very durable, have astounding sound quality(GREAT bass, which is a must for me), and the call quality is very clear on both the calling and receiving end. The Bluetooth connection is on point, and the controls are very user-friendly. I would recommend this product any day to any headphone enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Uche Nweke

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sound great, and the noise cancelling is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Gelene R. Grice

customer_reviews.title: band cracked
customer_reviews.text: The band connecting the 2 headphones cracked although I took good care of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: 10 months.
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money. All taped up now. Just a cheap product with a popular brand on it. Disappointed in Samsung. For $170 I give half a star.

customer_reviews.title: They stop working.
customer_reviews.text: I had 3 replacement headphones in 13 month. Their reporting system even to the Office of the President is slow and unresponsive.

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are great mid-level headphones. Pros: * Great price point * They are super comfortable * Bluetooth AND NFC connectable * Has cord in case battery dies * Great sound * Cool Button Free touch pad for controlling volume, tracks and a cool ambient sound feature
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ward

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. The touch pad works awesome and is so much better then fumbling around looking for buttons. You just swipe or tap your ear. I also thought the noise canceling was gonna be BS but it isn't. I was standing near my fan with the headphones on and I could hear my fan buzzing, then I clicked on the noise cancellation and without any change to the sound of the music the sound of the fan disappeared. So my review is highly recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: These are my babies
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that they sound AMAZING (ALL HAIL NOISE CANCELLATION) and can fold up neatly into your jacket pocket. Samsung does it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kymon Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for around the house.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with them! Perfect for relaxing around the house listening to music and watching TV shows on a tablet or laptop. Clear sound. And with the Noise Cancellation there is a significant difference. Touch pad is very responsive and the app helps u control a lot more. Definitely recommend for people looking for a in home headset. However don't take it to the gym. Over all such a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Erik A.G.

customer_reviews.title: ... to a rattling in the left ear (Amazon was great with replacing it hassle free)
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my original pair due to a rattling in the left ear (Amazon was great with replacing it hassle free). I'm on my second pair now, and I'm starting to have the noise canceling feature go in and out. I'm hoping it resolves on its own, but if not I may have to replace them... again

customer_reviews.text: These are excellent headphones overall. Soud quality, loudness, and ANC are all good. The only thing that bugs me is the fact that they push against my ears causing some discomfort after some time. Its probably because my ears stick out a bit, but they are still comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: The product is good, but not even close to Bose. I have Samsung phone, which provides additional functions to the product. The noise cancelling function is not as good a Bose, but adequate. The battery life is another issue. If you travel on long-haul Asia flight, you have to recharge. Sometime it becomes inconvenient. Still thinking to add another $150 and go with Bose.

customer_reviews.text: Hard time adjusting volume,doesn't get that loud when on High.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie Pierce

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy these again..
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I prefer the Bose sound platform and overall feel but The Samsung Level On Pro won me over. The sound, track pad technology and listening options cant be beat for the price. There is also a Samsung Level App that controls the headphones when connected to your device. If I used a Samsung UHQ capable device (I use a Nexus 6P & iPod) I know this set could sound even better.
customer_reviews.author: L. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Headphones good, but Samsung not customer-focused.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones themselves are great. I got them for my mother-in-law to wirelessly connect to her Samsung TV in order that she can listen at fairly high volume without disturbing anyone. The headphones are comfortable, the Bluetooth connection was relatively easy to set up, and they perform well. I docked one star from the rating because it is (at least to date) impossible to get a users manual beyond the brief quick start guide, despite reference to one in the material that came with the headphones. Contacting Samsung about this has been an exercise in frustration.
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: Bad expereince. Possible only from that unit. Opt refund rather than hassle with repairs or replacement.
customer_reviews.text: During operation of the bluetooth when used touch pad on headset to stop music expereinced pulsating base like sound omitted from the left ear piece into my ear. Turning off noise cancelling and bluetooth the sound ceased but return when action was reappiied. Sound began to cause a nausing sensation and I experienced fear of damaged eardrum. Returned to Amazon within required time for refund. Headphones also did not produce clear sound and were somewhat muffled. Not much in treble unable to hear purcussions instruments . Perhaps only defective unit. When purchased only five reviews written.
customer_reviews.author: Man of Integrity

customer_reviews.title: cheap

Volume level is awful for music (I like mine loud), really do not like these after having the Bose ones, going back to those! I wouldnt give these one star if I didnt have to.

customer_reviews.text: I had a friend help me do a blind test between these and the Bose QuietComfort 35. I selected the Bose over these in every test - listening to classical, pop/dance, and listening to nothing (noise cancelling on). If you don't mind spending the extra money, get the Bose.
customer_reviews.author: AP Fritts

customer_reviews.title: I do not like it I need to return this product if it ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not like it I need to return this product if it possible I don't have ideas how to return
customer_reviews.author: alem m abebe

customer_reviews.title: Works great...until the weak structure design breaks.
customer_reviews.text: Great moderate priced noise-cancelling wireless headphones. I do like their touch pad controls and decent battery life. However that's a moot point once the hoop breaks and renders all those good features useless. I saw the prior reviews so I took extra care with these, which made no difference. Born August 2018 - RIP April 2019. You can see the other side starting to form small cracks too. Samsung will not warranty these, they only offer to repair at customer cost. So now it seems that I should have just went right for better quality headphones first. Now I will not consider buying Samsung TVs or Headphones in the future based off my customer dis-satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: JRP

customer_reviews.title: Buy these if you have a samsung phone
customer_reviews.text: If You own a Samsung phone. Buy these if you are looking for headphones. The noise cancellation is better than other noise cancelling headphones I've tried. But the reason is the app gives Samsung users so much more customization and additional features that other headphones don't give. Plus it sounds very good
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: For this price it should hold a charge for longer than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of use of this product. It connected easily to my tv with bluetooth. I live in an apartment and children live above me. They sound like a herd of elephants. This doesn't cancel out their sound but it certainly makes it more palatable. They become uncomfortable after several hours if any of you are like me who watch tv for extended periods of time. I would give this a four star rating if the batter hadn't stopped charging after 6 months. This isn't at a price point where I will just replace it with another one. I am very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: dar2drm4ever

customer_reviews.title: Third set purchased...third set broken.
customer_reviews.text: The first set of these I had broke just above one of the earpieces. Purchased a second set, and something in one of the speakers "rattled" constantly, with the speaker buzzing when in use. So I returned those and, glutton for punishment, purchased a third set. Only a few months old and they broke right above the earpiece again. Great sound/noise cancellation/battery life. But terrible construction. I'm done with this brand. DO NOT BUY THESE.
customer_reviews.author: EJG

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, poor design!
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound, problem is the product is poorly manufactured! I purchased a pair and they broke within 30 days of use. I thought maybe I did something to break them so i purchased a new pair and they also broke in the same exact spot! Samsung refused to replace them, so I'm not buying another pair that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Niqua Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: We got these headphones for our Son for high school graduation to use in college. He love's them and uses them often when we talk on the phone and Skype. He uses them when he travels on airlines to watch movies too. We got just got them again for our daughter's high school graduation for her to use in college as well.
customer_reviews.author: Foxpointe

customer_reviews.title: Choppy sound
customer_reviews.text: Pairing this headphone with my Samsung TV was easy. But I couldn't get it to play sound with any fidelity. The sound was constantly choppy even when standing right next to the TV. The longest stretch it played sound for was may be 10 seconds at the most. Normally, the sound was constantly choppy.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Big fan of these Level On headphones
customer_reviews.text: Coming from the first gen. Level Over headphones, I LOVE these. They are compact, light weight, more responsive, and better designed. Sound quality is fantastic and noise cancellation works well. Talk thru technology allows the sounds you want to hear to be heard.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P. Marino

customer_reviews.title: I did find that these were better than other over the ear headphones I had tried ...
customer_reviews.text: I did find that these were better than other over the ear headphones I had tried around the same price, but even with the noise cancelling turned on, I found that I still heard so much more ambient noise in any on-ear/over-ear headphone than my $30 earbuds. I returned them, I don't think the technology is there yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Worth for the price, maybe slightly less.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few days ago and been using it. Sound quality is a very good, even better when you plug in the wire. I felt it could be better but I think that level of headphone quality you have to pick up The Momentum 2.0 wireless or better at current price of 420 dollars. This being at less than half the price it has really good audio and I am satisfied by it. Love the touch sensitive side controls. Design is great, comfort is great but it is on ear. Over all really great product, best at price point. I feel better than similarly priced Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Had the device for almost two years, light usage...then suddenly the left arm broke... Headphones sound good, battery is good but...for almost $200 they are not worth it.

customer_reviews.title: long battery and amazing sound control, couldnt ask for more.
customer_reviews.text: Had been using actively it past two months. I mostly use it @ "Gym". long lasting battery and amazing sound control, couldnt ask for more.

customer_reviews.title: Tight on Ears But Great Sound and Features
customer_reviews.text: Great features and easy use, but too snug on my ears. Ears become sore over time. I wish there was a way to adjust the tension to be less tight. I use them anyway, but not long.

customer_reviews.text: Own two pairs. Each bought as a gift for my kids. They are way better than Beats.

customer_reviews.text: Loving it so far. The touch pad takes some time to get use to but makes all the difference when you get a hold of it.

customer_reviews.text: They work and sound even better than the ones i had previously. And the delivery was very fast, even tho i'm no prime user.

customer_reviews.text: Not bad head phones. But wouldn't recommend to buy if you can afford the more expensive ones.

customer_reviews.text: Great wireless headphones. Pairs easily with my Samsung phone and tablet. Great no ice cancelling.

customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable, have good battery life, and they sound great. Not sure there's much more to say.

customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, battery life sucks and there could be better directions on how to use the thing.

customer_reviews.text: It provides ultra high quality sound and it makes itself easy to play with just by tapping the headphone. The noise cancelling feature also helps a lot when I'm in the subway station or walking in the street.

customer_reviews.text: These sound better than the Bose soundlink 2 and they even have noise cancellation. Bose are more comfortable but these are better bang for your buck

customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic and they really work to cancel the noise on flights. I prefer these over the Bose (my former headphones) for both quality of sound and noise cancellation capabilities. The sounds is crisp and clear

customer_reviews.text: Bought these awhile ago and were great until they started falling apart. mind you I rarely use these headphones they spend their time mainly in the hard case i bought for them unfolded.
customer_reviews.author: CDiaz

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is very shallow and a bit tinny but worst of all is the very poor insulation --for commuter ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphone are extremely disappointing. The sound quality is very shallow and a bit tinny but worst of all is the very poor insulation --for commuter riding a train, the ceaseless rattle of the cups renders them pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: Feature wise a good product, but it is not comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Poor fit; uncomfortable to use. ANC is ok, but not as good as BOSE QC15. When i used it with samsung S7, i can tell from bluetooth HCI snoof log that they are using the samsung's proprietary codec (forgot the name however). It supports also AptX and AAC from what i recall with wireshark and btavdtp. Feature wise this is a good product for its price, but wearing is not comfortable. Its size is kinda in between over-ear and on-ear. It does not wrap my ear, but it is also noticeably bigger than other on-ear i have used (such as AKG Q460). I feel pain with my ear after using this for about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Protium

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones by Samsung!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely AWESOME headphones! I was between Beats or Lever On Pro, damn! I'm so happy I made a great decision buying this. Samsung lover here!, glad they made a perfect headphones, they never dissapoint me with their products. The sensor is very sensitive but I'll get use to it. The ANC is amazing!, it really works They arrived today, two days earlier. I highly recommend this samsung level on pro headphones Thanks amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Guzmán

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as other competitor. The quality is lacking: less then a year abs 5 uses adds the leather is falling apart. Amazon, as seller, refused any refund or replacement. Samsung was stand behind its product providing a replacement so I'm changing it to 3 stars for Samsung and 0 for Amazon customer service.
customer_reviews.author: gre

product_meta.title: Samsung Level On PRO Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones with Microphone and UHQ Audio, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackDesigned with premium materials and finishes, the level on wireless Pro conveys Prestige and quality. The Convenient Foldable frame makes them easy to carry and store while the lightly tensioned headband makes them perfect for long-term listening. Controls, keep music and phone controls easy, intuitive and right at your fingertips. Talk-in mode, allows you to turn ambient noise on or off while listening to audio. Ideal for situations where outside sound is helpful - like when using public transportation. Sound share allows you to share your streaming audio with a second level on wireless Pro, level on wireless or level U Pro headset. Ultra high quality audio (uhqa) technology delivers a true 24bit digital audio experience with up to 2X wider frequency range than standard cd-quality wireless sound. Combined with Active noise cancellation, listeners experience Vivid, Concert Hall sound. Uhqa is Compatible with select Samsung Galaxy devices. Customers are advised to check if their smartphone supports Bluetooth UHQA by visiting the product page on Samsung.Com.
feature_bullets: Active Noise Cancellation and UHQ audio for richer and clearer sound
Battery Life up to 10 hours talk/10 hours play/200 hours standby
